subject: Special Agent Dr.  Michael
body:
Special Agent Dr.  Michael Wise,  
FBI Headquarters,
Anti-Terroristand Monetary Crimes Division In conjunction with
U.S Department Of Justice. U.S National Central Bureau Of Interpol.
ATTENTION:  
I am Dr. Michael Wise, the personal secretary to the FBI Director, Christopher A. Wray. Investigations revealed that you have spent a lot of your hard earned money obtaining transfer documents as requested by Imposters, costing you a lot of money, yet all efforts to receive your overdue payment have been to no avails.
With the help of some of the best Internet investigators attached to the FBI, we have taken out time in screening through this project as stipulated on our protocol of operation and in addition, we sent special financial crime investigators from Washington DC to Europe and Africa in other to carry out proper investigations after receiving series of reports similar to yours as you are not the only person awaiting the legal transfer of funds from Europe and Africa.
Based on the findings of our special financial crime investigators, we discovered that your impending payment is being delayed by Imposters, claiming to be Bank Managers or Government Officials , In our bid to transparency, I am pleased to inform you that a meeting was held as regards the best way to affect the compensation exercise for transparency and most especially to avoid re-occurrence of the delay in payment. In conclusion, we came to a final resolution as all the Financial Institutions involved were duly represented. Hence been empowered to assist the U.S. National Central Bureau of INTERPOL in Ireland and all the financial institutions involved.
The first batch of payment; Two million, five hundred thousand United States dollars ($2,500,000.00), Will be credited to your account via CITIBANK EUROPE Plc in Ireland.
The transfer of your above funds has to be done and concluded in the last quarter of this year 2020.
Note. You are required to contact the Citibank Europe Plc immediately via this E-Mail(
infocitibkeu@zohomail.com
) and forward your personal / banking details to them.
We have instructed Citibank Europe Plc to transfer your funds to you as soon as possible.
Make sure you keep me updated once you receive your funds.
Federal Bureau of Investigation
Law enforcement agency
Washington, D.C., United States.
..........................................
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure.

subject: Re:    Special Agent Dr.  Michael
body:
Hello Special Agent Dr. Michael Wise,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite surprising to hear about the situation, especially considering the involvement of so many high-profile organizations.

I'm curious, how did you come across my case specifically? And could you please elaborate on the process that led to this resolution?

Also, I would like to know more about these "imposters" you mentioned. How were they able to delay my payment and what measures are being taken to prevent such incidents in the future?

Regarding the transfer of funds, it's great news that it will be done via CITIBANK EUROPE Plc in Ireland. However, I'm a bit confused about why my personal banking details need to be forwarded. Could you explain this further?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Wayne
